title: Why is URF so bad?
body: In a mode where 80% CDR exists, the champs who just build IE and right click or build full tank will ALWAYS beat you in a 1v1. Also, Nasus and Nid can literally BD with no minions and win before you back so? What's the balance team doing besides nerfing Garen E?

replies.body: The mode literally buffs range auto attackers over melee ones, read the passive next time you play. It's absurd. The crit buff is ridiculous.
So you take urf seriously when it's just a humorous game mode? Sounds like it isn't the game's problem {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
You sound like one of those people that flame teammates if they don't do well in URF.

People like them ruin urf.
Its SUPPOSED to be absurd.

> [{quoted}](name=Rocnation98,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0hxnvyOw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2020-02-06T02:46:19.988+0000)
>
> People like them ruin urf.
> Its SUPPOSED to be absurd.

You're correct.  Tryhards are sooooo funny.
Very impressive match history. I am very impressed. No sarcasm intended. Thank you for your valued input
Thanks for the helpful input. You probly get far in life being a ginger and have lots of friends who don't think your skin and hair are gross. Thanks again

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
then again, it is URF. The game that is so ridiculous that you launch yourself out of a Gatling gun like a midget in a cannon at a shitty redneck circus.
Its not bad. stop taking it so seriously.
Very helpful and relevant. Thank you
